thoughts.text: Let's use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a summary of the website we just explored.
thoughts.reasoning: By getting a summary of the website, we can quickly see what it has to offer and decide if we want to explore it further or move on to another website.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a summary of the website we just explored
thoughts.criticism: The summary may not be comprehensive enough to give us a complete picture of the website, but it should be enough to give us an idea of what it has to offer.
thoughts.speak: Let's use the 'get_text_summary' command to get a summary of the website we just explored and see what it has to offer.

args.question: What is a summary of the website?
